key_items: man in green pouring liquid over his head,man in blue pouring liquid over his head
explanation:

At [21-28], the man in green pours liquid over his head, with the liquid running down his face and clothes. This action is clearly depicted in the video. Earlier, at [12-21], the man in blue also pours liquid over his head. These are the only two instances of liquid being poured over someone's head. The dense caption confirms these actions, but the video itself shows these events happening twice. This aligns with Option C, "Two times," as both instances are clearly visible in the video. There is no indication of this action happening more than twice, eliminating other options.
</think>
